page.title: 04EDUCATION- CONTINUED
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A PUPIL AT PRIMARY SCHOOL I arrive at school at 9 and play in the yard until the bell goes at 9.15.Registration lasts until 9.25 when we do Maths until l0.15 when there is a break.At 10.30 we have English for an hour, then Religious for 30 minutes.Lunchtime is between 12 and 1.15.We then have Options for an hour until break at 2.15. At 2.30 we again have Options until hometime at 3.25. I arrive home at 3.50 and watch television until teatime at 6.At 6.45 I go to Cubs where we make fires and play games.I go to Scotthall Sports Centre at 8.40 with my sister.We arrive home at 9.30, have a bath and go to bed by 10.10pm.
